subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Corey Brewer scored 23 points and the Nuggets earned their 19th straight home win over the Dallas Mavericks. But Denver may have lost Danilo Gallinari with an injury.
snippet: Corey Brewer scored 23 points and the Nuggets earned their 19th straight home win over the Dallas Mavericks. But Denver may have lost Danilo Gallinari with an injury.
